name: Spinderella
description:
With this project I stuck to my goal of not using any asset packs.

All programming, game art, sounds, music, materials and textures were created from scratch.  I learned a lot!

SOURCE CODE:
Click here to view the project in GitHub.

Feel free to use anything from the project in your own projects.  If you do, just let me know and be sure to credit me for what you use.

Feedback, thoughts, questions?
I'd love to hear any feedback, questions, or just general chatter.  Find me in the Facebook group, or:
